name: Golden Lane
description:
GOLDEN LANE

Made for the GMTK  Jam 2021 in 48 hours (well, 40, really).

You are Magdalena, a village witch on the outskirts of Prague near the turn of the 17th century. Rudely awakened by guards knocking down your door, you're forced at swordpoint to Prague, where the Holy Roman Emperor Rudolf II is forcing occultists of all kinds to search for the Philosopher's Stone.

You're a witch, not an alchemist. You have no idea what you're doing. But they left you with a whole laboratory and a lot of alchemical books, and some of the formulae look like they could help you get out of here...

Gameplay is disturbingly similar to conducting academic research. You've been warned.

CREDITS

DESIGN AND DEVELOPMENT: Evan J. Malcolm

ART CONSULTATION: James Sack & Kalista Taylor

ART & SOUND CREDITS:

Truly and honestly, every single person who puts free assets up is a hero.
